full_summary:
### Title
Patrol Services for Upper Johnstone Strait & Mainland Inlets
#### French Title
Services de patrouille du détroit supérieur de Johnstone et des bras de mer du continent

### Tender Details
* Reference number: PW-22-01015565
* Amendment number: 0
* Solicitation number: 30002842
* Publication date: December 1, 2022
* Tender closing date: January 17, 2023 1:00 PM EST

### Procurement Information
* Goods and Services Code (GSIN): F030A (Fisheries Resources Management Services)
* UNSPSC code: None
* Notice type: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
* Procurement method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection criteria: None
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Vendor Information
* Contracting entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (Pêches et Océans Canada)
* Contracting entity address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada
* End user entities: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (Pêches et Océans Canada)

### Tender Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks a contractor to conduct Salmon Patrol Services for stream enumeration surveys by swimming or on-foot in Pacific Fishery Management Areas 12, 13, and 14 (Johnstone Strait & Mainland Inlets). The intent is to establish a standing offer for each patrol area, allowing the contractor to provide services on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Important Dates
* Standing offer: February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2028
* Tender closing date: January 17, 2023, 1:00 PM EST

### Attachments
* Tender document (English) - available at [registration link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/45fb340bcf75185c0608df7b134fe88c/30002842_-_rfso_upper_johnstone_strait_mainland_inlets_en.pdf)
* Tender document (French) - available at [registration link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/41acb3e3968e4f1eed
